snippet: Shares of Sirius XM Holdings rose after it announced it had signed Howard Stern to another five-year deal.
abstract: Stocks have biggest rise in more than week, aided by increasing energy and bank shares.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Sirius XM Holdings rose after it announced it had signed Howard Stern to another five-year deal.

headline.main: Shares Log Biggest Gains in More Than a Week
headline.print_headline: Shares Log Biggest Gains in More Than a Week
